BS.name: Buyer to seller
BS.desc: The transport from the buyer to the seller.

SB.name: Seller to buyer
SB.desc: The transport from the seller to the buyer.

SC.name: Subcontractor to seller
SC.desc: The transport from the subcontractor to the seller.

SD.name: Seller to drop ship designated location
SD.desc: The transport from the seller to the drop ship designated location.

SF.name: Seller to freight forwarder
SF.desc: The transport from the seller to the freight forwarder.

SS.name: Seller to subcontractor
SS.desc: The transport from the seller to the subcontractor.

ST.name: Mother vessel to lighter
ST.desc:
Cargo is transferred from the main carriage or mother vessel to a
                                    lighter.

SU.name: Lighter to mother vessel
SU.desc:
Cargo is transferred from the lighter vessel to a main carriage or
                                    mother vessel.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc:
A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and
                                    as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code
                                    list.
